name: Introduction to Web Development
description: An introduction to the basic concepts and technologies used in web development.

lessons.name: HTML Fundamentals
lessons.description: Basic structure and elements of HTML.

lessons.name: CSS Styling
lessons.description: Introduction to CSS for styling web pages.

lessons.name: Introduction to JavaScript
lessons.description: Basic concepts of JavaScript programming language.

name: Frontend Development
description: Exploration of frontend development frameworks and techniques.

lessons.name: React.js Basics
lessons.description: Introduction to React.js library for building user interfaces.

lessons.name: State Management with Redux
lessons.description: Understanding state management with Redux in React applications.

lessons.name: Responsive Web Design
lessons.description: Designing web pages that adapt to different screen sizes using CSS.

name: PDP
description: Introduction to the fundamental concepts of programming and problem-solving.

lessons.name: Introduction to Programming Languages
lessons.description: Overview of different programming languages and their features.

lessons.name: Basic Data Structures
lessons.description: Introduction to fundamental data structures such as arrays, lists, and stacks.

lessons.name: Algorithm Design Basics
lessons.description: Fundamental principles of algorithm design and analysis.

name: PDP Part 2
description: Exploration of object-oriented programming concepts and principles.

lessons.name: Classes and Objects
lessons.description: Understanding classes, objects, and their relationships in object-oriented programming.

lessons.name: Inheritance and Polymorphism
lessons.description: Concepts of inheritance and polymorphism in object-oriented programming.

lessons.name: Encapsulation and Abstraction
lessons.description: Understanding encapsulation and abstraction in object-oriented design.

lessons.name: ER concepts
lessons.description: Overview of different types of entities and relations.

lessons.name: Drawing ER Diagram
lessons.description: Understanding ER Diagram rules.

lessons.name: SQL
lessons.description: SQL Concepts

lessons.name: DDL Commands
lessons.description: Overview of DDL Commands available.

lessons.name: DML Commands
lessons.description: Overview of DML Commands available.

lessons.name: Procedures and Triggers
lessons.description: Overview of Procedure, Trigger and Functions

name: Introduction to Algorithms
description: An introduction to the fundamental concepts and techniques of algorithms.

lessons.name: Algorithm Analysis
lessons.description: Analyzing the efficiency and performance of algorithms.

lessons.name: Sorting Algorithms
lessons.description: Introduction to various sorting algorithms such as bubble sort, selection sort, and merge sort.

lessons.name: Searching Algorithms
lessons.description: Introduction to various searching algorithms such as linear search, binary search, and hash table.

name: Advanced Algorithms
description: Exploration of advanced algorithms and data structures.

lessons.name: Dynamic Programming
lessons.description: Understanding dynamic programming techniques for optimization problems.

lessons.name: Graph Algorithms
lessons.description: Study of graph algorithms such as depth-first search, breadth-first search, and shortest path algorithms.

lessons.name: Greedy Algorithms
lessons.description: Introduction to greedy algorithms and their applications in solving optimization problems.
